title: Rattling Foundations
story: The raging tempest batters the ancient edifice, causing the very stones to groan and shift. The castle seems to come alive with a malevolent intent.
effect: While this card is active, Jonathan Harker suffers 1 Sanity loss if he ends his turn in the First Tower Bedroom, Master Bedroom, or Second Tower Bedroom. Additionally, any hero moving through the Catacombs Stairwell must roll a D6; on a result of 1-2, they are immediately forced into the Dungeon and lose 1 Health.
